document_data.caption: A map of eastern Sembia showing the Coastwatch along the Sea of Fallen Stars.
document_data.name: Coastwatch
document_data.mainbody: The '''Coastwatch''' was a small road found in [[Sembia]] that connected [[Yhaunn]] in the north with the smaller towns of [[Surd]] and [[Tulbegh]] in the south along the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Description: The Coastwatch ran roughly north to south, bending westward to pass through Surd near its halfway point.
